parameters.description: The data format. Value can be xml or json

parameters.x-ms-summary: The starting record returned. 0 is the first record
parameters.description: The starting record returned. 0 is the first record

parameters.name: limit
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250
parameters.description: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.x-ms-summary: Startin timestamp for updated date YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z
parameters.description: Starting timestamp for updated date YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.x-ms-summary: Ending timestamp for updated date YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z
parameters.description: Ending timestamp for updated date YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: limit
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250
parameters.description: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.x-ms-summary: Start timestamp by updated date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z
parameters.description: Start timestamp by updated date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.x-ms-summary: The ending timestamp to filter by update date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z
parameters.description: The ending timestamp to filter by update date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

get.summary: Gets a list of bills sorted by date of latest action

parameters.description: The data format. Value can be xml or json

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting record returned. 0 is the first record

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.description: Starting timestampe for update date. Use YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.description: The ending timestamp to filter by update date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by update date in Congress.gov. Value can be updateDate+asc or updateDate+desc

parameters.description: The data format. Value can be xml or json

parameters.description: The status of the member. Use true or false. Use currentMember=True for the current congress data only
